document.full_text: microsoft has confirmed that the long-rumored first-person shooter halo 4 is in development, with an expected launch time of holiday 2012.
document.title: e3 2011: 'halo 4' confirmed, launching in 2012
lines_and_colors: microsoft has confirmed that the long-rumored first-person shooter halo 4 is in development, with an expected launch time of holiday 2012.
